ygData.subject: Re: unclear on the concept
ygData.msgSnippet: The faster weapon should go in your secondary slot. Since your dual wield skill is checked when it s delay goes off.  A faster weapons mean more DW checks,
ygData.messageBody:
The faster weapon should go in your secondary slot. Since your dual wield
skill is checked when it's delay goes off. A faster weapons mean more DW
checks, which means more chance to hit with the second weapon. That said
the difference between your two weapons is only .2 seconds, so in this case
it is something you would never notice. But if you want to maximize that is
the way to go.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
>I have a Dragoon dirk (6/23) and a pugius (5/21) theory says that I should
>put the pugius as my main weapon but it's ratio is lower than the dragoon
>dirk. So, over time, wouldn't I be doing more damage (at level 17) by
>having
>the Dragoon dirk as my primary?
>
>Tszaaz
